amendatorysection.para: The department shall collect the tax provided for in section 68-1803 and remit the tax to the State Treasurer for credit to the ICF/DD Reimbursement Protection Fund. Beginning July 1, 2014, no proceeds from the tax provided for in section 68-1803, including the federal match, shall be placed in the General Fund unless otherwise provided in the ICF/DD Reimbursement Protection Act.
